addRelation

public void addRelation(java.util.List<java.lang.String> rTypeForward,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> rTypeBackward,
                        java.util.List<Concept> obj)
Adds a new union of intersections to this concept containg an intersection of relations created using given relation types (fw+bw) and given relation objects

Parameters:
rTypeForward - list of forward types of relations
rTypeBackward - list of backward types of relations
obj - list of concepts to be used as objects

getAllRelations

public java.util.List<UnionOfIntersections> getAllRelations()
Gets all unions of intersections for this concept by adding the unions of intresections that have it as the owner and creating unions of intersections for each relation that has this concept as object

Returns:
list of UnionOfIntersections
